correctness.rationale: Multiple critical issues with factual alignment and schema compliance. Key problems: (1) Unit/value errors: growthPerCycle reported as 0.05 Å, but article states 0.05 nm/cycle (=0.5 Å/cycle); pressure set to 5 mmHg while article gives ~5 mbar (~3.75 mmHg); dosing and purge times given as 1.1 ms but article reports 1.1 s—if schema requires milliseconds, values should be 1100 ms. (2) Schema violation: plasmaPower is set to null, but the schema expects an object or omission (no nulls allowed). (3) Fabricated/untraceable data: flowRates, saturation (True), nucleationPeriod (10 cycles), optical properties (n, absorption, band gap and Tauc plot), electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility and Hall), uniformity, conformality, film composition (XPS values and 1:1 ratio), film density (5.6 g/dm3), and all deviceProperties are not reported in the article. (4) Minor: film thickness 150 nm is within the 150–200 nm range but presented as a precise value. Correct/Review: growthPerCycle (set to 0.5 Å), pressure (~3.75 mmHg), dosing/purge times (1100 ms if using MilliSEC), remove plasmaPower or provide valid object (not null), and remove or leave unspecified all properties not supported by the article (flowRates, saturation, nucleationPeriod, optical/electrical/device metrics, uniformity, conformality, composition, film density). Preserved correct items include precursor/co-reactant (ZnCl2/O2), carrier/purge gas (N2), reactor (F-120, Microchemistry), substrate (GaN/Al2O3), delivery method (gas flow), temperature (480 °C), cycle count (4000), and roughness (0.45 nm RMS).

completeness.rationale: Extraction contains numerous untraceable or incorrect values and several schema issues. Positives: one ZnO ALE-GF process is captured with correct reactants (ZnCl2/O2), reactor (Microchemistry F-120), substrate (GaN/Al2O3), carrier/purge gas (N2), cycle structure (1.1-s precursor and O2 doses separated by 1.1-s purges), temperature (480 °C), cycles (~4000), roughness (0.45 nm AFM), and monocrystalline by XRD. Major problems: (1) Pressure: article reports ~5 mbar; extracted uses 5.0 MilliM_HG (≈5 mTorr), off by ~×750; should be ≈3750 MilliM_HG. (2) Growth-per-cycle: article states 0.05 nm/cycle (0.5 Å/cycle); extracted 0.05 Å is ×10 too low. (3) Dosing/purge times: article gives 1.1 s; schema unit is MilliSEC—extracted uses 1.1 ms instead of 1100 ms. (4) Film thickness inconsistency: article says ~150–200 nm in 4000 cycles; extracted fixes 150 nm while GPC×cycles implies ~200 nm; also duplicative filmThickness at processParameters level violates schema (additionalProperties=false). (5) Plasma power set to null violates schema type (should omit since not PEALD). (6) Many values are fabricated and not traceable to the article: flow rates (10 sccm for precursor/co-reactant/purge), saturation=true, nucleationPeriod=10 cycles, optical properties (n, band gap, absorption), electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), uniformity, conformality, film density, elemental concentrations/atomic ratios, device properties—all not reported in the paper. (7) SupercycleDesign provided with empty arrays is unnecessary for a binary process. To improve: correct pressure unit/value; correct GPC to 0.05 nm/cycle (or 0.5 Å); convert dosing/purge times to 1100 ms; remove plasmaPower or provide valid object only if PEALD; remove the extra filmThickness at processParameters level and reconcile film thickness with cycles and GPC; remove or leave empty (where schema allows) all properties not supported by the article (flowRates, saturation, nucleationPeriod, optical/electrical/device/uniformity/conformality/filmComposition/filmDensity), or add them only if traceable. Overall, the extraction is not complete nor factually aligned with the article and has schema inconsistencies.
